plot: Father Ted and Jack go on a picnic, while Dougal makes friends with a local bad boy priest.

The priests go to a picnic site, where Ted falls foul of the zealous attendant Benson and Dougal is influenced by recalcitrant young priest Father Damo Lennon, who encourages him to pierce his ear and smoke dope. When Benson's whistle is stolen a priest is identified as having been the thief and Ted's lecture to Dougal on doing the right thing leads to his arrest before Damo is finally exposed as the thief.—don @ minifie-1
